testcase.name: Verify the verfication module is present or not
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Scroll & click till "Verification" menu on the side bar...............passed Then Verify that the user is able to navigate to "Verification" section.....passed

testcase.name: Verify all sub-modules are displayed correctly after Clicking on the "verification" Module.
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Scroll & click till "Verification" menu on the side bar...............passed Then Verify that the user is able to navigate to "Verification" section.....passed Then Verify that "Inventory" button is visible..............................passed Then Verify that "Pharmacy" button is visible...............................passed

testcase.name: Verify the presence of Requisition tab in inventory section with all fields.
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Scroll & click till "Verification" menu on the side bar...............passed Then Verify that the user is able to navigate to "Verification" section.....passed Then Verify that "Inventory" button is visible..............................passed Then Verify that "Pharmacy" button is visible...............................passed And Click on "Requisition" under "Inventory"................................passed Then Verify these elements are visible on the page Requisition, Purchase Request, Purchase Order, GR Quality Inspection, Ok, print, First, Previous, Next, Last, view, search bar, Requisition Status, Date range, Pending, Approved, Rejected.passed

testcase.name: Verify to navigate on another sub module after open the inventory module
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Scroll & click till "Verification" menu on the side bar...............passed Then Verify that the user is able to navigate to "Verification" section.....passed And Click on "Pharmacy" tab.................................................passed Then Verify that the user is able to navigate to "Verification/Pharmacy/" section.passed

testcase.name: Verify to navigate on another sub tab after open the Requisition tab
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Scroll & click till "Verification" menu on the side bar...............passed Then Verify that the user is able to navigate to "Verification" section.....passed And Click on "Purchase Order" under "Inventory".............................passed Then Verify that the user is able to navigate to "Verification/Inventory/PurchaseOrder" section.passed

testcase.name: Verify to search the data by picking the date filter
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Scroll & click till "Verification" menu on the side bar...............passed And Choose the date from Jan 2020 to March 2024.............................passed And Click on the "all" Radio button from List by Verification Status........passed And Click on OK button......................................................passed Then Verify that all the dates present inside the requested date are within the range.passed

testcase.name: Verify the tooltip and its text present on hover the mouse on Star
testcase.system-out: When Login in the healthapp application.....................................passed Given Scroll & click till "Verification" menu on the side bar...............passed Then Hover on the star and Verify tooltip text as "Remember this Date"......passed
